content: evanesco a spell used to vanish objects at least in a series of books featuring a boy wizard and his friends i can t promise these socks will actually vanish but they will be much less visible in sneakers or other shoes perfect for when you don t want your socks showing this sock recipe contains instructions for making a basic toe-up sock and includes my variation on an afterthought heel with gusset and heel flap the construction of the heel fits well even with high fronts and has the advantage of a super-comfortable heel cup with absolutely no wrap/turn short-row stitches there is an optional heel tab that includes a few short row the pattern includes instructions for worsted weight fingering weight in 2 sizes and details for changing the size for a custom fit gauge worsted 5 5 stitches and 8 row per inch fingering 9 stitches and 11 row per inch techniques see resources below magic loop jmco judy s magic cast-on left and right lifted increases afterthought heel ssk p2tog materials 100g sock yarn socks pictured worsted novita 7 brothers fingering zauberball crazy 40 circular needle worsted size us 6 4 0mm fingering size us 1 2 25mm darning needle scrap of waste yarn in a contrasting colour toes using jmco cast on 8 worsted 12 64 stitch sock 14 72 stitch sock stitches per needle1 16 24 28 total you will be working in the round see resources for dpn/2 circular method row 1 knit 1 round row 2 front k1 m1r knit until 1 stitch before end of needle m1l k1 back repeat for a total of 10 14 16 stitches per side / 20 28 32 total repeat these two rounds knit 1 round knit the next round with a total of 4 increases until you have 24 32 36 stitches for each side of the sock 48 64 72 stitches for the sock total 2 knit one round on the front of the sock only knit 11 15 17 kfb knit 12 16 18 this gives you an odd number on the front of the sock which is necessary to centre the stitch pattern sock foot knit 10 20 20 rounds in pattern then pause to check gauge and customise length worsted 1are your feet pointy on fingering weight start with 8 stitches per needle 16 total really wide toes try starting with 16 stitches per needle 32 total 2not sure if you need 64 or 72 stitches work to 64 stitches and place the toe cap over your foot it should cover your first 4 toes and just touch your pinkie toe if it doesn t then you should work the 72 stitch sock keep on
